articles.title: Technical problems prevent astronauts from installing new solar panels on space station - CNN
articles.description: On Wednesday morning, NASA astronaut Shane Kimbrough and European Space Agency astronaut Thomas Pesquet conducted a spacewalk to begin the installation of new solar arrays. Technical issues interfered with completing the task.
